translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Triad-Couplet-Conditioned Arising Discourse

analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa ni dassana ttika upa ādinna duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinno dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na upādinnaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ  na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham upādinnam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naupādinno ca🔽dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na upādinnaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na upādinnaḥ ca  dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, sahajāte nissaye kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha sahajāte nissaye kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate cha

original: Sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinno dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naanupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sappaṭighassa na anupādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta
translated: A visible-data-object that is impingement with possibility of contact is a condition, as object condition, for a non-cognizable non-impingent mental-data-object. (Abbreviated.)

original: Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte nava, kamme cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā vigate tīṇi, avigate nava.
analyzed: ārammaṇe nava anantare samanantare tīṇi upanissaye purejāte nava kamme cha atthiyā nava natthiyā vigate tīṇi avigate nava
translated: In the object nine, in the preceding and in the immediately preceding three, in the decisive support nine, in kamma six, in presence nine, in absence three, in disappearance three, in non-disappearance nine.
